title: Not getting your roles in Norms.
body:
I reckon the reason why there's so many trolls in ranked is because people never get their roles in normals so instead they do it on ranked where they can get their preferred role to try out their champions and shit.

I was considering doing the same because I 10% of the time get my role and I get really pissed off about it. I bought Kindred today and I could only play her ONCE because people called their role before me all the time.

Where's our Normals Draft mode?

replies.body: As riot has said we don't have the population to support both blind and draft pick its either one or the other and I honestly prefer blind pick to draft. Since draft pick takes so long to go through

If there is only one, then Draft pick would actually be fairly quick, the only complaint you can have is then that it takes like 3-4 minutes in champ select, but, you spend 2 minutes in Norm's champ select, assuming no one dodges because of someone taking their role.

Fact is riot don't give a shit, or we would have Draft Normals instead of blind pick.

Again like I said I don't like draft pick for normals 1 cos sometime I just like to play the champ no one likes 
2 it allows for mirror match ups 
And 3 I know riot doesn't give a shit if they did give a shit they wouldn't have lied about our sever skin and they would have given us a decent one at that. 

Also have w do u work out that if riot gave a shit we would have draft over blind pick hell for all u know the majority of ice does prefer blind to draft so changing it for the minority would be a bad thing

I'm pretty sure that you and majority of people can agree that fighting for 1 role is annoying af especially if some dickhead just instalocks then argues about fucking your mum or sister or dad. Most or all of these can be solved if Draft pick for normals was on the OCE server think about it. You pick 2 roles. 50/50 you get either role. No arguments, no instalocker, no fucking of anyones mother, father, sister ect.
Just like the guy above said, he wanted to play kindred and didn't get the chance cause roles are called. BOOM, Draft pick, he picks ADC or JG and either role he gets to play kindred. It's a Win Win. And idk who the "Majority" of people is that likes blind pick, but it sure seems none existent. Also that whole "Too small of a population" That's an excuse we all know that

1 if he wants to play kindred then he can he doesn't need to be jg or adc iv played her both mid and top with no problems. Fuck before they nerfed kindred into the ground I would use her for any role but support, also I honestly hate the whole pick your lane before the game. It's so easy for the enemy to counter pick if you are first pick.
As for the majority thing I said I was using that as an example fuck if I know if the majority want blind or draft idk. 
As for the population thing when u consider Lol has about 100 million players a Month and when u consider that of those 100 million only 1.67% is made up of the oce sever we really are a tiny sever. Now when I end up waiting 10 minutes for a game on blind pick, how long do u think I would end up waiting on draft pick
how the fuck did u wait 10 min for a norms blind pick lol.
simple really play at all during the day on weekdays and u can some times get time of up to 10 minutes, another way is to play late at night when no one is on.

I feel at least draft normals should be a thing at least on say sunday and wednesdays or something though, like a half-assed rotating gamemode esque thing which would also work pretty well as a tutorial for the ranked champ select because honestly banning and picking in time in draft terrified me and I almost banned my main champion that I had indicated I was going to pick, that would have been so rip. Also the tutorials are so bad, either fix them or remove them, cause they don't help new players they just make things even worse and convince new players to rush thornmail on adcs..

> [{quoted}](name=LAKIGR,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=dqHIe8TU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-19T10:06:00.149+0000)
>
> As riot has said we don't have the population to support both blind and draft pick its either one or the other and I honestly prefer blind pick to draft. Since draft pick takes so long to go through

Yet they have ARAM, twisted treeline and the rotating game mode queues. Surely they can include draft pick.

Look we have a population of something like 210,000 ranked players now when u consider we currently have 3 permanent queues if u devised that up evenly u have 70,000 players per queue. That's enough for something like 7000 games to be held at once if everyone was online all day every day. Which they aren't. Then also don't forget a good portion on those are probably smurf accounts. And don't forget we had team build a few years back and we all know how well that work, u ended up waiting 30 minutes for a game. So unless u want to force people into support cos let's face it, in normals 90% of people don't want to play support so if riot makes them play support they will be on the Boards bitching about how they never get their role and they get shafted with support so no we can't support another permanent queue

Riot is mixing dynamic queue with draft. All we are asking for is to be able to pick our roles and ban. Obviously normals needs to be able to mix this with complete freedom in amount to queue with. This would result in dynamic queue. The problem is Riot know people will complain as usual if they 100-0 dynamic normals.

They are also afraid that since OCE is a small server with less casuals, more people play carry roles than supports or tanks. If we had dynamic normals the queue times would be crazy.
But then again the matchmaking is so fucking useless it wont matter if you pick your roles. you will still get trolls and people who don't know their champs and people who don't know League.
if you put it to a vote i bet it would be in favor of draft....
Those who are complaining about the queue times, I'd rather wait 20 minutes to play a role I want than go through a 40 minute game playing a role I don't want.
